Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-50966 affecting package rabbitmq-server for versions less than 3.11.24-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-50966 affecting package rabbitmq-server for versions less than 3.11.24-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rabbitmq-server is earlier than 3.11.24-2, affected by CVE-2023-50966
